name: liby64
short_description:
Y64 is a variant of Base64 encoding designed to be URL safe. It was developed and used at Yahoo. This C library translates between 8-bit character arrays and Y64. For more information, see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Base64 and http://www.yuiblog.com/blog/2010/07/06/in-the-yui-3-gallery-base64-and-y64-encoding/

Much of the code came directly from libb64 (https://sourceforge.net/projects/libb64/).
summary: C library for Y64 encoding and decoding
